00034 #include <net-snmp/net-snmp-config.h>
00035 
00036 #if !HAVE_STRTOUL
00037 
00038 #if defined(LIBC_SCCS) && !defined(lint)
00039 static char     sccsid[] = "@(#)strtoul.c   8.1 (Berkeley) 6/4/93";
00040 #endif                          /* LIBC_SCCS and not lint */
00041 
00042 #if HAVE_LIMITS_H
00043 #include <limits.h>
00044 #endif
00045 #include <ctype.h>
00046 #include <errno.h>
00047 #if HAVE_STDLIB_H
00048 #include <stdlib.h>
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 /*
00052  * Convert a string to an unsigned long integer.
00053  *
00054  * Ignores `locale' stuff.  Assumes that the upper and lower case
00055  * alphabets and digits are each contiguous.
00056  */
00057 unsigned long
00058 strtoul(const char *nptr, char **endptr, int base)
00059 {
00060     const char     *s = nptr;
00061     unsigned long   acc;
00062     unsigned char   c;
00063     unsigned long   cutoff;
00064     int             neg = 0, any, cutlim;
00065 
00066     /*
00067      * See strtol for comments as to the logic used.
00068      */
00069     do {
00070         c = *s++;
00071     } while (isspace(c));
00072     if (c == '-') {
00073         neg = 1;
00074         c = *s++;
00075     } else if (c == '+')
00076         c = *s++;
00077     if ((base == 0 || base == 16) && c == '0' && (*s == 'x' || *s == 'X')) {
00078         c = s[1];
00079         s += 2;
00080         base = 16;
00081     }
00082     if (base == 0)
00083         base = c == '0' ? 8 : 10;
00084     cutoff = (unsigned long) ULONG_MAX / (unsigned long) base;
00085     cutlim = (unsigned long) ULONG_MAX % (unsigned long) base;
00086     for (acc = 0, any = 0;; c = *s++) {
00087         if (!isascii(c))
00088             break;
00089         if (isdigit(c))
00090             c -= '0';
00091         else if (isalpha(c))
00092             c -= isupper(c) ? 'A' - 10 : 'a' - 10;
00093         else
00094             break;
00095         if (c >= base)
00096             break;
00097         if (any < 0 || acc > cutoff || (acc == cutoff && c > cutlim))
00098             any = -1;
00099         else {
00100             any = 1;
00101             acc *= base;
00102             acc += c;
00103         }
00104     }
00105     if (any < 0) {
00106         acc = ULONG_MAX;
00107         errno = ERANGE;
00108     } else if (neg)
00109         acc = -acc;
00110     if (endptr != 0)
00111         *endptr = (char *) (any ? s - 1 : nptr);
00112     return (acc);
00113 }
00114 
00115 #endif                          /* !HAVE_STRTOUL */
